Cause & Remedy:

It is caused by a bacteria called #Mycobacterium_Tuberculosis.
TB is not spread by touching, kissing or sharing food or dishes.
In countries with high rates of TB infection, infants are often given the Bacillus Calmette Gu√©rin (BCG) vaccine.

#Tuberculosis

A #contagious infection that usually attacks lungs. But it can also attack other parts of the body, including the kidneys, spine, and brain.
It is spread from person to person through tiny droplets released into the air via coughs and sneezes.
